title: Impact of POM's coordination mode and Mo-hybrid constituents on the binding, stability, and catalytic properties of hybrid (pre)catalysts
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,19029-19040
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03563A, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Jana Pisk, Višnja Vrdoljak, Mirna Mandarić, Tomica Hrenar, Dominique Agustin, Mirta Rubčić
POM-based hybrids have been synthesized and used as (pre)catalyst. Quantum chemical calculations have been applied to evaluate the hybridtype stability.
